I think that last option of being peacefull's the best. I'm really 
getting annoyed at all the OOC emails.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
>     I understand people being upset about Minime, and JP's comments 
> concerning him.  However as I sit here and read my mail, I see the 
group 
> being polarized.  This deeply upsets me.
> 
>     I did not know Minime well.  In fact I hardly, if ever 
interacted with 
> him.  However we were instructed to remember him.  Do we honor this 
memory by 
> arguing amongst ourselves?  Will we slowly drive the members of 
this group 
> away until we run out of targets and turn against each other?  Or 
will we 
> stop the senseless bickering, honor him with a day of silence, and 
continue 
> on mourning and remembering in our own ways?
